name: Cambodia Tech Hope
description: A long-term project to create a non-profit initiative focused on training IT teachers in rural Cambodia, empowering local communities through technology.

name: BTC Game Store
description: A web platform for distributing indie games across multiple platforms, featuring integrated Bitcoin payments to support developers directly.

name: Leonardo - Annihilated
description: The powerful story of a resilient developer fighting against systemic barriers, using technology as a weapon to rebuild his life from the streets.
